title: Pixel 3 XL Repair?
content:
I want to send my Pixel 3 XL for a repair. It is under warranty according to google site where I checked with IMEI.
 It was bought in Germany but I live in Greece.
 It has a charging problem, I went to a local repair center and they told me that the flex tape/cable that connects the charging port and the mic to the motherboard needs a replacement and they don't have spare parts. 
How can I send it to Google Repair Center in Germany where it was originally bought? 
Thank you.
